title: november 9: a great escape (that wasn’t)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia tells a tale of fake news before fake news became the buzzword it is today. In 1874, a newspaper made up a 10,000 word story about animals escaping the Central Park Zoo! Maia also revisits a recent hit single. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
